description: Kick off your next, great Gatsby project with this default-starter-intl. This barebones starter ships with the main Gatsby configuration files you might need.
author: Louis Bertin
index-intro: Passionate about high-tech and computers since my childhood. I've discovered web development five years ago thanks to my university courses. My curiosity help myself to develop multiple skills in web development. You can find what I can do on the page about my knowledge.
tools-intro: My everyday tools, all the things I need

notfound.description: You just hit a route that doesn't exist... the sadness.
